item.title: "没人想打仗。也没人想被侵略"。征兵、特别国防税、与美国五五分担。@edgarsrinkevics 和 @AlarKaris 通过 @ft 告诉我和 @rmilneNordic 欧洲人必须如何为安全做得更多。
item.description:
"Nobody wants to fight. Nobody wants to be invaded as well." Conscription, special defence tax, 50-50 burden sharing with US. @edgarsrinkevics and @AlarKaris tell me and @rmilneNordic how Europeans must do more for securityhttps://t.co/7OOcCPAa1C via @ft

— Ben Hall (@hallbenjamin) March 25, 2024

item.title: 关于莫斯科音乐厅袭击事件的最新消息：- 四名嫌疑人都在法庭上接受了简短审判- 他们都是塔吉克斯坦公民- 看起来都遭到了严重殴打- 至少有两人认罪- 法庭已将他们逮捕，等待正式审判
item.description:
Latest update on the Moscow concert hall attack:

- each of the four suspects was briefly in court
- all are citizens of Tajikistan
- all looked like they had been severely beaten
- at least two pleaded guilty
- court has arrested them until proper trialhttps://t.co/jqUVqpGmBK

— Polina Ivanova (@polinaivanovva) March 24, 2024

item.title: 本周，各国央行纷纷发出鸽派信息，对多次降息的前景进行权衡，这让全球股市为之一亮。 以下为 @ft 提供的《颠覆时代
